other_tests.findings: Obstructive jaundice, stent placement, removal of many stones, sphincterotomy.

Liver shows no focal lesion; portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow; CBD measures between 6 and 7 mm; gallbladder contracted around multiple stones; wall mildly thickened at 8 mm; trace pericholecystic fluid; no sonographic signs elicited.
